name: DengueVirusInfectionTestsForDengueVirusIgGOrTotalAntibodyQualitative
title: Dengue Virus Infection (Tests for dengue virus IgG or Total Antibody [Qualitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of dengue virus IgG and total antibody (qualitative results).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Dengue virus antibody and IgG antibody;  

LOINC Search terms: "Dengue Ab IgG Ord -panel -interpretation"),(Exclusion Criteria: panel and interpretation tests)
